_header: Well may I plain on you Lady Money
_description: Thomas Hoccleve, Appeal to Lady Money — a roundel, twenty-four lines

HunHM744.First Lines:
Wel may I pleyne on yow lady moneyeÞat in the prison of your
                    sharp scantnesseSouffren me bathe in wo and heuynesseAnd deynen nat of
                    socour me purueyeWhan þat I baar of your prison the keyeKepte I
                    yow streite nay god to witnesse…
HunHM744.Last Lines:
…Elles I moot in right a feynt gladnesseSynge to yow thus
                    & yow accuse & seyWell may I et cetera
HunHM744.Attributed Title:
Cy ensuent trois chaunceons lune conpleynante a la dame monoie et lautre
                        La response dele a cellui qui se conpleynt & la tierce la commendacion
                        de ma dame (f. 51v)
